Text.Page:
The Red Fangs are making their push for control by starving what's left of our people in the Celestial Hills. Mostly, they're raiding our last farm.

Hunt down the {@LinkCreature:7#7#Red Fang ragers} and kill them.

Report to Heroth at Godric's Farm when you're finished.
It's good to see a soldier willing to slog through the blood and the muck to get things done.
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
